programme.title: The First 48 - Shooting Blind/Brothers in Arms (#431) (Season 21, Episode 25)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, detectives question whether a young woman's death was a tragic mistake or murder. In Mobile, the murder of a young father tests a bond between brothers.

programme.title: The First 48 - Old Flame/Bad Behavior (#435) (Season 21, Episode 28)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, when a late-night shootout leaves a young man dead, the investigation leads to a woman from his past. When a Marine veteran is shot, detectives must determine if a claim of self-defense is a cover for the truth.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - The Profilers (Season 1, Episode 5)
programme.desc: Sophisticated crime fighters map the psychological and physical terrain of multiple murderers.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - House Hermit (Season 4, Episode 3)
programme.desc: Police search for the killer of an elderly upscale Toronto couple.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Cover Up (Season 1, Episode 2)
programme.desc: Criminals attempt to cover their trails using fire, water, or by chopping their victims to pieces, but they can't escape modern forensic science.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Vanished (Season 3, Episode 2)
programme.desc: After the owner of a private school for students vanishes from his driveway, police scramble to find him.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Bloody Valentine (Season 2, Episode 2)
programme.desc: Forensics shows the real killer in the murder of a socialite on Valentine's Day 2001.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Thrill Kill (Season 6, Episode 5)
programme.desc: Phoenix police face a unique serial killer team that is stalking and killing innocent people.
